Text:
Also, if you are not aware, this release of Final Doom, in TNT Evilution have one level bugged (it was like this in the original and still is on most of the TNT wads out there)
Download this fix from the guys who made that game 
http://www.teamtnt.com/other/tnt31fix.zip and unzip it and load the wad like this in the TNT folder:
DOOM2 -FILE TNT31.WAD
You can buy them now in Steam for a acceptable price. However you might not get the Master Levels with Doom II as before.
